largest_number.title: Largest Number
largest_number.instructions: Create a function that takes a list of numbers and returns the largest number in the list.

add_two_numbers.title: Add Two Numbers
add_two_numbers.instructions: Create a function that takes two numbers and returns their sum.

check_number_even.title: Check Number Even
check_number_even.instructions: Create a function that takes a number and returns whether the number is even or not.
